title: MOUSE4/MOUSE5  not detected ingame
body:
Since this new patch, my MOUSE4/MOUSE5 cannot be detected in game.
What I mean by this is clicking these mouse buttons aren't detected at all in game so you cannot use them to bind a new hotkey or use an existing hotkey. In the client, they are detected fine and I can use the button to bind things via the client settings menu.

The actual buttons work fine in Windows and all other apps.

Using borderless window mode.
Mouse is Logitech G900.

Anyone else experienced this at all?
Tested for 3-4 games and same thing each time.

replies.body:
Okay managed to fix this. Related to Windows 10 creators update.

Refer to:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/pHpwePN6-mouse-4-5-buttons-not-working-after-windows-10-major-update?show=flat&page=2
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/WRAM7bBh-side-mouse-buttons-not-working?show=flat&page=3
https://forums.warframe.com/topic/793049-w10-creators-update-and-mouse-buttons/?page=2

Mine was fixed by disabled some HID devices in device manager.
And its back again today...not sure whats going on lol. Might not be LoL related.

Okay this is now fixed after rebooting my PC (day after).

Restarting the client when it was happening didn't fix it though which is odd.
